quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
quotes.author: Victor Kiam

quotes.quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: If you're insincere, it's manipulative.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Mere longevity is a good things for those who watch Life from the side lines. For those who play the game, an hour may be a year, a single day's work an achievement for eternity.
quotes.author: Gabriel Heatter

quotes.quote: Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The only way around is through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: I feel that the greatest reward for doing is the opportunity to do more.
quotes.author: Jonas Salk

quotes.quote: You've got to be before you can do, and do before you can have.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: If life were measured by accomplishments, most of us would die in infancy.
quotes.author: A. P. Gouthey

quotes.quote: The person who gets the farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare. The sure-thing boat never gets far from shore.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Everyone who got where he is has had to begin where he was.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
quotes.author: Chinese proverb

quotes.quote: Duty makes us do things well, but love makes us do them beautifully.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A non-doer is very often a critic-that is, someone who sits back and watches doers, and then waxes philosophically about how the doers are doing. It's easy to be a critic, but being a doer requires effort, risk, and change.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Do not be desirous of having things done quickly. Do not look at small advantages. Desire to have things done quickly prevents their being done thoroughly. Looking at small advantages prevents great affairs from being accomplished.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty the more glory in surmounting it. Skillful pilots gain their reputation from storms and tempests.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: We live in deeds, not years: In thoughts not breaths; In feelings, not in figures on a dial. We should count time by heart throbs. He most lives Who thinks most, feels the noblest, acts the best.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Remember, you can earn more money, but when time is spent is gone forever.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The first requisite of success is the ability to apply your physical and mental energies to one problem without growing weary.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: It's your aptitude, not just your attitude that determines your ultimate altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Every man who is high up loves to think that he has done it all himself; and the wife smiles, and lets it go at that.
quotes.author: Sir James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: We will either find a way, or make one.
quotes.author: Hannibal

quotes.quote: My mother drew a distinction between achievement and success. She said that achievement is the knowledge that you have studied and worked hard and done the best that is in you. Success is being praised by others. That is nice but not as important or satisfying. Always aim for achievement and forget about success.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: The best job goes to the person who can get it done without passing the buck or coming back with excuses.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: High achievement always takes place in a framework of high expectation.
quotes.author: Jack Kinder

quotes.quote: Man is always more than he can know of himself; consequently, his accomplishments, time and again, will come as a surprise to him.
quotes.author: Golo Mann

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.author: Foster C. Mcclellan

quotes.quote: I am always doing things I can't do, that's how I get to do them.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The measure of a man is the way he bears up under misfortune.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The truth of the matter is that there's nothing you can't accomplish if: (1) You clearly decide what it is that you're absolutely committed to achieving, (2) You're willing to take massive action, (3) You notice what's working or not, and (4) You continue to change your approach until you achieve what you want, using whatever life gives you along the way.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: All of us perform better and more willingly when we know why we're doing what we have been told or asked to do.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Nothing is as difficulty as to achieve results in this world if one is filled full of great tolerances and the milk of human kindness. The person who achieves must generally be a one-idea individual, concentrated entirely on that one idea, and ruthless in his aspect toward other men and other ideas.
quotes.author: Corinne Roosevelt Robinson

quotes.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential, these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Eddie Robinson

quotes.quote: The average estimate themselves by what they do, the above average by what they are.
quotes.author: Johann Friedrich Von Schiller

quotes.quote: Everybody says they want to be free. Take the train off the tracks and it's free - but it can't go anywhere.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: I love America. We've got the only system that works - it keeps everyone hustling.
quotes.author: J.R. Simplot

quotes.quote: The only worthwhile achievements of man are those which are socially useful.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Encouraged people achieve the best; dominated people achieve second best; neglected people achieve the least.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: God put me on Earth to accomplish a certain number of things. Right now I'm so far behind I will never die!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you don’t climb the mountain, you can’t view the plain.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Remember that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Money will buy you a bed, but not a good night's sleep, a house but not a home, a companion but not a friend.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The man who wakes up and finds himself famous hasn't been asleep.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To go beyond is as bad as to fall short.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: To reach a great height a person needs to have great depth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nothing splendid has ever been achieved except by those who dared believe that something inside them was superior to circumstances.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Destiny is not a matter of chance, it is a matter of choice; it is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
quotes.author: William JenningsBryan

quotes.quote: Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
quotes.author: Frank Clark

quotes.quote: This became a credo of mine . . . attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: We achieve everything by our efforts alone. Our fate is not decided by an almighty God. We decide our own fate by our actions. You have to gain mastery over yourself. . . . It is not a matter of sitting back and accepting.
quotes.author: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: Unless a man undertakes more than he possibly can do, he will never do all that he can.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.quote: Hell, there are no rules here , we're trying to accomplish something.
quotes.author: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.quote: We succeed only as we identify in life, or in war, or in anything else, a single overriding objective, and make all other considerations bend to that one objective.
quotes.author: General Dwight David Eisenhower

quotes.quote: What is the recipe for successful achievement? To my mind there are just four essential ingredients: Choose a career you love . . . Give it the best there is in you . . . Seize your opportunities And be a member of the team. In no country but America, I believe, is it possible to fulfill all four of these requirements.
quotes.author: Benjamin F. Fairless

quotes.quote: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: You can finish school, and even make it easy – but you never finish your education, and it's seldom easy.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: If we are striving, if we are working, if we are trying, to the best of our ability, to improve day by day, then we are in the line of our duty.
quotes.author: Heber J. Grant

quotes.quote: Never measure the height of a mountain, until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskj’ld

quotes.quote: Most x-rated films are advertised as "adult entertaintment,"for "mature adults," when in reality they are juvenile entertainment for immature and insecure people.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: We are more ready to try the untried when what we do is inconsequential. Hence the remarkable fact that many inventions had their birth as toys.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
quotes.author: H. L. Hunt

quotes.quote: Most of us can learn to live in perfect comfort on higher levels of power. Everyone knows that on any given day there are energies slumbering in him which the incitements of that day do not call forth. Compared with what we ought to be, we are only half awake. It is evident that our organism has stored-up reserves of energy that are ordinarily not called upon, deeper and deeper strata of explosible material, ready for use by anyone who probes so deep. The human individual usually lives far within his limits.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever, the one who recognizes the challenge and does something about it.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Many marriages would be better if the husband and wife clearly understood that they're on the same side.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You don't drown by falling in water; you only drown if you stay there.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Where the willingness is great, the difficulties cannot be great.
quotes.author: Niccol Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The more you express gratitude for what you have the more you will have to express gratitude for.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Hell begins on the day when God grants us a clear vision of all that we might have achieved, of all the gifts which we might have wasted, of all that we might have done which we did not do.
quotes.author: Gian-Carlo Menotti

quotes.quote: Someone has defined genius as intensity of purpose: the ability to do, the patience to wait. . . . Put these together and you have genius, and you have achievement.
quotes.author: Leo J. Muir

quotes.quote: Only if you reach the boundary will the boundary recede before you. And if you don't, if you confine your efforts, the boundary will shrink to accommodate itself to your efforts. And you can only expand your capacities by working to the very limit.
quotes.author: Hugh Nibley

quotes.quote: Achievement is largely the product of steadily raising one's levels of aspiration . . and expectation.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
quotes.author: General George Smith Patton, Jr.

quotes.quote: Five minutes, just before going to sleep, given to a bit of directed imagination regarding achievement possibilities of the morrow, will steadily and increasingly bear fruit, particularly if all ideas of difficulty, worry or fear are resolutely ruled out and replaced by those of accomplishment and smiling courage.
quotes.author: Frederick Pierce

quotes.quote: Competition is a by-product of productive work, not its goal. A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: She looked at the crowd and she felt, simultaneously, astonishment that they should stare at her, when this event was so personally her own that no communication about it was possible, and a sense of fitness that they should be here, that they should want to see it, because the sight of an achievement was the greatest gift a human being could offer to others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: There are only two roads that lead to something like human happiness. They are marked by the words . . . love and achievement. . . . In order to be happy oneself it is necessary to make at least one other person happy. . . . The secret of human happiness is not in self-seeking but in self-forgetting.
quotes.author: Dr. Theodor Reik

quotes.quote: A handful of pine-seed will cover mountains with the green majesty of forest. I too will set my face to the wind and throw my handful of seed on high.
quotes.author: William Sharp

quotes.quote: Kids go where there is excitement. They stay where there is love.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The things we accept as normal and enjoy today were considered impossible twenty-five years ago and beyond the power of man to achieve. The early "Buck Rogers" and "Flash Gordon" comic strips were fantastic and considered outside the realm of man's attainment. They were considered figments of man's imagination, but now many of these miraculous, imaginative things have become realities and man is pushing onward toward new and higher goals of achievement. We are now mentally prepared for every new invention and advancement in technology and the sciences, but, nevertheless, stand amazed at man's powers to create and achieve. These outstanding accomplishments, which approach the miraculous, to me are unquestioned evidence of man's divine nature. Man has sent up satellites which circle the globe. He has taken the breathtaking, miraculous ride about the earth. He expects to circle the moon and even land man on the outer planets; also he considers feasible floating platforms in outer space as intermediate stations for interplanetary travel.
quotes.author: Delbert L. Stapley

quotes.quote: When you give a man a dole you deny him his dignity, and when you deny him his dignity you rob him his destiny.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Periods of tranquility are seldom prolific of creative achievement. Mankind has to be stirred up.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: You can do anything you wish to do, have anything you wish to have, be anything you wish to be.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Man is not the sum of what he has but the totality of what he does not yet have, of what he might have.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Achievement seems to be connected with action. Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: Personal development is your springboard to personal excellence. Ongoing, continuous, non-stop personal development literally assures you that there is no limit to what you can accomplish.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The only people who achieve much are those who want knowledge so badly that they seek it while the conditions are still favorable. Favorable conditions never come.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's not the situation, but whether we react (negative) or respond (positive) to the situation that's important.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: No bed is big enough to hold three.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: To understand your parents, love you must raise children yourself.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Love is a second life; it grows into the soul, warms every vein, and beats in every pulse.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Love of country is like love of woman, he loves her best who seeks to bestow on her the highest good.
quotes.author: Felix Adler

quotes.quote: I could never love where I could not respect.
quotes.author: Charlotte Elizabeth Aiss

quotes.quote: Love is a great beautifier.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: What is lovely never dies, But passes into other loveliness, Star-dust, or sea-foam, flower or winged air.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: I was nauseous and tingly all over. . . . I was either in love or I had smallpox.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I used to think that being nice to people and feeling nice was loving people. Now I know it isn't. Love is the most immense unselfishness and it is so big I've never touched it.
quotes.author: FlorenceAllshom

quotes.quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are traveling the dark journey with us. Oh, be swift to love, make haste to be kind.
quotes.author: Henri Fredric Amiel

quotes.quote: Love is the immortal flow of energy that nourishes, extends and preserves. Its eternal goal is life.
quotes.author: Smiley Blanton

quotes.quote: What force is more potent than love.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: Give love and unconditional acceptance to those you encounter, and notice what happens.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossom and fruit.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Food offered without affection is like food offered to the dead.
quotes.author: Hindu Proverb

quotes.quote: How does one measure time? No, not in day, months, or years. It is measured by the most precious of all things: Love. Without which all beings and things whether brave and/or beautiful would perish.
quotes.author: Irish Blessing

quotes.quote: It's easy to halve the potato where there’s love.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Love and eggs are best when they are fresh.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: Love makes the time pass. Time makes love pass.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: In real love you want the other person’s good. In romantic love you want the other person.
quotes.author: Margaret C. Anderson

quotes.quote: I am a lover and have not found my thing to love.
quotes.author: Sherwood Anderson

quotes.quote: Love is acceptance. When you love someone . . . you take them into your heart, and that is surely why it hurts so much when we lose someone we love, because we lose a part of ourselves.
quotes.author: Andrew

quotes.quote: A love that defies all logic is sometimes the most logical thing in the world.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A part of you has grown in me, together forever we shall be, never apart, maybe in distance, but not in heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A self-centered man admitted: "Sure, I know that the Bible says to love our neighbors as ourselves. But frankly, I don't believe that my neighbors can stand all that affection."
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A woman who pretends to laugh at love is like a child who sings at night when he is afraid.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: But isn't hate just scorned love?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Children need love, especially when they don't deserve it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: He who tries to forget a woman, never loved her.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I did not hear the words you said, instead I heard the love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I've learned that true friendship continues to grow, even over the longest distance. Same goes for true love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If music be the food of love, then play on.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If we deny love that is given to us, if we refuse to give love because we fear pain or loss, then our lives will be empty, our loss greater.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you begin the day with love in your heart, peace in your nerves, and truth in your mind, you not only benefit by their presence but also bring them to others, to your family and friends, and to all those whose destiny draws across your path that day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you deny childhood, you deny life. They can’t speak up for themselves so we must. It's like, how do we define love, It's a very, very deep feeling, but It's I think the most important force of life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you fear nothing, you love nothing. If you love nothing, what joy can there be in life?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you love someone, let them go. If they return to you, it was meant to be. If they don't, their love was never yours to begin with.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you love someone, you must be strong enough to allow them to be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In love, unlike most other passions, the recollection of what you have had and lost is always better than what you can hope for in the future.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is better to have loved and lost, than to have hated and won.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is kindness in a person, not beauty that wins our love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's much easier to turn a friendship into love, than love into friendship.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Lonely is a man without love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love at first sight is one of the greatest labor-saving devices the world has ever seen.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love can cure heartbreaks, misfortune, or tragedy. It is the eternal companion.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get, it's what you are expected to give which is everything.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is eternal as long as it lasts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is for fools wise enough to take a chance.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is like a violin. The music may stop now and then, but the strings remain forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is not blind, it sees more not less; But because it sees more it chooses to see less.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is what dreams are made of.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love may conquer all, but it needs time as its field general.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love your friend with his faults.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Make love, not war; get married and do both!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Make your life an act of love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My need is not to be on the outside glaring in; its to be in the center with you. To be loved is nice, but not essential. To love someone, that's what makes life worth living.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No one in love is free, or wants to be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nobody can fully understand the meaning of love until he's owned a dog. He can show you more honest affection with a flick of his tail than a man can gather through a lifetime of handshakes.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes a new love comes between old friends. Sometimes the best love was the one that was always there.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes I wish I were a little kid again, skinned knees are easier to fix than broken hearts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The heart that loves is always young.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The secret of love is seeking variety in your life together, and never letting routine chords dull the melody of your romance.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: 'Tis better to have loved and lost, then paid for it and not liked it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To be loved is to live forever in someone's heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To learn and never be filled, is wisdom; To teach and never be weary is love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To love something is to give it room enough to grow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: True love is the outward demonstration of inward conviction.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We can do no great thing, only small things, with great love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We learn to love that to which we give our time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We may give without loving, but we cannot love without giving.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What is Love? It's silence when your words would hurt, It's patience when your neighbor’s curt, It's defense when the scandal flows, It's thoughtfulness for another’s woes, It's promptness when stern duty calls, It's courage when misfortune falls.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What seems to grow fairer to me as life goes by is the love and the grace and tenderness of it; not its wit and cleverness and grandeur of knowledge, grand as knowledge is, but just the laughter of children, and the friendship of friends, and the cozy talk by the fire, and sight of flowers, and the sound of music.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you find a job you love, you'll never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you love somebody, you should follow your heart. Sometimes when you are with the person you love the most, you feel confused. You don’t know who you are or what you want but that is totally understandable. It is natural to let go of a part of yourself to be with that person but the important part is that you don’t lose your own identity in the process!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Where we love is truly home; home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Without love intelligence is dangerous; without intelligence love is not enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Without loving acts, loving words are meaningless.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Work is love made visible.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You have achieved success if you have lived well, laughed often and loved much.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You will find as you look back upon your life that the moments when you have really lived are the moments when you have done things in a spirit of love.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You've got to dance like no one's watching and love like it's never going to hurt.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: Things are beautiful if you love them.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: In dreams and in love there are no impossibilities.
quotes.author: Jnos Arany

quotes.quote: To love and win is the best thing; to love and lose is the next best thing.
quotes.author: Maximillian Arturo

quotes.quote: Absence does not make the heart grow fonder, but it sure heats up the blood.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ashley

quotes.quote: In a great romance, each person plays a part the other really likes.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Ashley

quotes.quote: Love should be a vehicle allowed to travel without limitations.
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: Among those whom I like or admire, I can find no common denominator, but among those whom I love, I can: all of them make me laugh.
quotes.author: Wysten Hugh Auden

quotes.quote: I have often wondered how it is that every man loves himself more than all the rest of men, but yet sets less value on his own opinions of himself than on the opinions of others.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus

quotes.quote: It is by not always thinking of yourself, if you can manage it, that you might somehow be happy. Until you make room in your life for someone as important to you as yourself, you will always be searching and lost . .
quotes.author: Richard David Bach

quotes.quote: Respect for sovereignty, for privacy, for total independence. Gentle alliances against loneliness, they were, cool rational love-affairs without the love.
quotes.author: Richard David Bach

quotes.quote: A crowd is not company, and faces are but a gallery of pictures, and talk but a tinkling cymbal, where there is no love.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: It is impossible to love and be wise.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Poets are all who love, who feel great truths, And tell them; and the truth of truths is love.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.quote: True love is when your heart and your mind are saying the same thing.
quotes.author: Leanna L. Bartram

quotes.quote: Love thy neighbor as yourself, but choose your neighborhood.
quotes.author: Louise Beal

quotes.quote: Where love is concerned, too much is not even enough.
quotes.author: Pierre Augustin Caron de Beaumarchais

quotes.quote: Do not keep the alabaster boxes of your love and tenderness sealed up until your friends are dead. Fill their lives with sweetness. Speak approving, cheering words while their ears can hear them and while their hearts can be thrilled by them.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: We never know the love of our parents for us till we have become parents.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The most important things to do in the world are to get something to eat, something to drink and somebody to love you.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: Love ceases to be a pleasure when it ceases to be a secret.
quotes.author: Aphra Behn

quotes.quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: If a thing loves, it is infinite.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The secret of art is love.
quotes.author: Antoine Bourdelle

quotes.quote: It is the passion that is in a kiss that gives to it its sweetness; it is the affection in a kiss that sanctifies it.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bove

quotes.quote: Our first and last love is self-love.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bove

quotes.quote: When the one man loves the one woman and the one woman loves the one man, the very angels leave heaven and come and sit in that house and sing for joy.
quotes.author: Brahman

quotes.quote: When our eyes see our hands doing the work of our hearts, the circle of Creation is completed inside us, the doors of our souls fly open, and love steps forth to heal everything in sight.
quotes.author: MichaelBridge

quotes.quote: After observing the loved and the unloved, we found the loved ones rarely tried to manipulate others.
quotes.author: W. W. Broadbent

quotes.quote: The essence of romantic love is that wonderful beginning, after which sadness and impossibility may become the rule.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: The best proof of love is trust.
quotes.author: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: No matter how love-sick a woman is, she shouldn't take the first pill that comes along.
quotes.author: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: The ability to make love frivolously is the thing which distinguishes human beings from the beasts.
quotes.author: Heywood Campbell Broun

quotes.quote: To love is to transform; to be a poet.
quotes.author: Norman O. Brown

quotes.quote: Who so loves believes the impossible.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Loveliest of lovely things are they On earth that soonest pass away. The rose that lives its little hour Is prized beyond the sculptured flower.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love, this is the eternal rule.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Guatama Buddha

quotes.quote: Love thou the rose, yet leave it on its stem.
quotes.author: Edward Robert Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Had we never loved sae kindly, Had we never loved sae blindly, Never met or never parted, We had ne'er been broken-hearted!
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: To see her is to love her, And love but her forever; For Nature made her what she is, And never made anither!
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: No cord or cable can draw so forcibly, or bind so fast, as love can do with a single thread.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: No happiness is like unto it, no love so great as that of man and wife, no such comfort as a sweet wife.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: Love . . . [is] a lack of personal selfishness.
quotes.author: Theodore M. Burton

quotes.quote: A wife says to her husband (or vice versa), "Do you love me?" "Of course," he replies. "I've been married to you for twenty years, haven't I?" How satisfied would we be if we presented someone with a vintage wine and, upon asking his opinion of it, he replied, "I'm drinking it, aren't I?" Love still needs expression between those who share it.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Death is a challenge. It tells us not to waste time . . . It tells us to tell each other right now that we love each other.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: The person who has earned love the least needs it the most.
quotes.author: F. Enzio Busche

quotes.quote: Absence is to love what wind is to fire; it extinguishes the small, it enkindles the great.
quotes.author: Comte de Bussy-Rabutin

quotes.quote: L'amour vient de l'aveuglement, l'amitie de la connaissance. (Love comes from blindness, friendship from knowledge.)
quotes.author: Comte de Bussy-Rabutin

quotes.quote: It is better to have loved and lost than to never have lost at all.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: All love at first, like generous wine, Ferments and frets until tis fine; But when tis settled on the lee, And from the impurer matter free, Becomes the richer still the older, And proves the pleasanter the colder.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler, the older

quotes.quote: To live is like love, all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler, the younger

quotes.quote: Respect is love in plain clothes.
quotes.author: Frankie Byrne

quotes.quote: In her first passion, a woman loves her lover, in all the others all she loves is love.
quotes.author: George Gordon, Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Man's love is of man's life a part; it is a woman's whole existence.
quotes.author: George Gordon, Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Love is so much better when you are not married.
quotes.author: Maria Callas

quotes.quote: The act of love . . . is a confession. Selfishness screams aloud, vanity shows off, or else true generosity reveals itself.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: You have to walk carefully in the beginning of love; the running across fields into your lover’s arms can only come later when you’re sure they won’t laugh if you trip.
quotes.author: Jonathan Carroll

quotes.quote: France is the only place where you can make love in the afternoon without people hammering on your door.
quotes.author: Barbara Cartland

quotes.quote: Anything will give up its secrets if you love it enough.
quotes.author: Dr. George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: Love not what you are, but what you may become.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Love, such as in society, is only the exchange of two fantasies, and the contact of two bodies.
quotes.author: Sabastien Chamfort

quotes.quote: To love is to approach each other center to center.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: The deep joy we take in the company of people with whom we have just recently fallen in love is undisguisable.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.quote: Can there be a love which does not make demands on its object?
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: He who remembers from day to day what he has yet to learn, and from month to month what he has learned already, may be said to have a love of learning.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Love may not make the world go round, but I must admit that it makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Sean Connery

quotes.quote: Better to love amiss than nothing to have loved.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: Last time I tried to make love to my wife nothing happened, so I said to her, 'What's the matter, you can't think of anybody either?'
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible, it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
quotes.author: Barbara DeAngelis

quotes.quote: For two people to please one another they must be very nearly alike, so that they may understand each other, and slightly different, so that they may have something to understand in each other.
quotes.author: Diane

quotes.quote: Romance has been elegantly defined as the offspring of fiction and love.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The magic of first love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: We are all born for love. . . . It is the principle of existence, and its only end.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disreali

quotes.quote: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: But love’s a malady without a cure.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Pains of love be sweeter far, than all other pleasures are.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: When beauty fires the blood, how love exalts the mind!
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: If you have respect and consideration for one another, you’ll make it.
quotes.author: Mary Durso

quotes.quote: No, this trick won't work. . . . How on earth are you ever going to explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told that I am loved. I am not sure that you are of the same kind. But the realm of silence is large enough beyond the grave. This is the world of light and speech, and I shall take leave to tell you that you are very dear.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: All mankind love a lover.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Love, and you shall be loved. All love is mathematically just, as much as the two sides of an algebraic equation.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: At one time through love all things come together into one, at another time through strife’s hatred, they are borne each of them apart.
quotes.author: Empedocles

quotes.quote: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Sincere love is something that sacrifices not something that indulges itself. Sincere love is responsible. It would never knowingly hurt, but would heal.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: Artists in each of the arts seek after and care for nothing but love.
quotes.author: Marsilio Ficino

quotes.quote: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: There is a lady sweet and kind, Was never face so pleased my mind; I did but see her passing by, And yet I love her till I die.
quotes.author: Thomas Ford

quotes.quote: Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it. Bitterness paralyzes life; love empowers it. Bitterness sours life; love heals it. Bitterness blinds life; love anoints its eye.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick, D.D.

quotes.quote: If people are allowed to love life, then they should also be allowed to hate it.
quotes.author: Brian Fox

quotes.quote: My father always told me, "Find a job you love and you'll never have to work a day in your life."
quotes.author: Jim Fox

quotes.quote: A man is already halfway in love with a woman who listens to him.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: Love is the only way to grasp another human being in the innermost core of his personality.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: Love and toothache have many cures, but none infallible, except possession and dispossession.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Love your enemies, for they will tell you your faults.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Money will buy you a fine dog, but only love can make it wag its tail.
quotes.author: Richard Friedman

quotes.quote: Immature love says, "I love you because I need you." Mature love says, "I need you because I love you."
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Love at the lips was touch, As sweet as I could bear; And once that seemed too much; I lived on air.
quotes.author: Robert Lee Frost

quotes.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Lee Frost

quotes.quote: We love the things we love for what they are.
quotes.author: Robert Lee Frost

quotes.quote: Love me or hate me, but spare me your indifference.
quotes.author: Libbie Fudim

quotes.quote: It's an extra dividend when you like the girl you’re in love with.
quotes.author: Clark Gable

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: A man in love is incomplete until he is married. Then he’s finished.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: One of my theories is that men love with their eyes; women love with their ears.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: We are all mortal until the first kiss and the second glass of wine.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.quote: Love is the strongest force the world possesses, and yet it is the humblest imaginable.
quotes.author: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

quotes.quote: My life is an indivisible whole, and all my activities run into one another: and they have their rise in my insatiable love of mankind.
quotes.author: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

quotes.quote: Whenever you have truth it must be given with love, or the message and the messenger will be rejected.
quotes.author: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest gift that one generation can leave to another.
quotes.author: Richard Garnett

quotes.quote: We must love one another. Only [by doing] so can our long years of toil and struggle reach full reward and we be crowned with life everlasting.
quotes.author: Susa Young Gates

quotes.quote: To love is to admire with the heart; to admire is to love with the mind.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: For you see, each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rosemonde Gerard

quotes.quote: The love of study, a passion which derives fresh vigor from enjoyment, supplies each day and hour with a perpetual source of independent and rational pleasure.
quotes.author: Gibbon

quotes.quote: And ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love has no other desire but to fulfill itself. To melt and be like a running brook that sings its melody to the night. To wake at dawn with a winged heart and give thanks for another day of loving.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love is the only flower that grows and blossoms without the aid of seasons.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Work is love made visible. And if you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work and sit at the gate of the temple and take alms of those who work with joy.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Your love shines in my heart as the sun that shines upon the earth.
quotes.author: Eleanor di

quotes.quote: . . . every tree near our house had a name of its own and a special identity. This was the beginning of my love for natural things, for earth and sky, for roads and fields and woods, for trees and grass and flowers; a love which has been second only to my sense of enduring kinship with birds and animals, and all inarticulate creatures.
quotes.author: Ellen Glasgow

quotes.quote: Romance is about the little things.
quotes.author: Gregory J. Godeck

quotes.quote: A life without love, without the presence of the beloved, is nothing but a mere magic-lantern show. We draw out slide after slide, swiftly tiring of each, and pushing it back to make haste for the next.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: That is the true season of love, when we believe that we alone can love, that no one could ever have loved so before us, and that no one will love in the same way as us.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: We are shaped and fashioned by what we love.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Love is something eternal, the aspects may change, but not the essence. There is the same difference in a person before and after he is in love as there is in an unlighted lamp and one that is burning. The lamp was there and it is a good lamp, but now it is shedding light, too, and that is its real function.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: The more I think about it, the more I realize there is nothing more artistic that to love others.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: But love is many things, none of them logical.
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: All his faults are such that one loves him still the better for them.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: I love everything that's old: old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Love you know, seeks to make happy rather than to be happy.
quotes.author: Charles William Gordon

quotes.quote: The true revolutionary is guided by a great feeling of love.
quotes.author: Ernesto 'Che Guevara

quotes.quote: Love does not just sit there, like a stone; it had to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.
quotes.author: Ursula Le Guin

quotes.quote: Find someone to love . . . and, oh, someone to love you.
quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

quotes.quote: Someone has written, Love is a verb. It requires doing not just saying and thinking. The test is in what one does, how one acts, for love is conveyed in word and deed.
quotes.author: David B. Haight

quotes.quote: Love is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: The story of a love is not important what is important is that one is capable of love. It is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: The truth is that there is only one terminal dignity, love. And the story of a love is not important, what is important is that one is capable of love.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Love is a hole in the heart.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Never judge someone by who he's in love with; judge him by his friends. People fall in love with the most appalling people.
quotes.author: Cynthia Heimel

quotes.quote: If you don't like yourself, you can't like other people.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get . . . Only with what you are expected to give. . . . Which is everything.
quotes.author: Katherine Hepburn

quotes.quote: You don't pick who you fall in love with. There are so few people to love. It's hard for one adult to even like another. Almost impossible.
quotes.author: Katherine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love and a cough cannot be hid.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The best smell is bread; the best saver, salt; the best love, that of children.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: I do love I know not what; Sometimes this, and sometimes that.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: Love is what is left in a relationship after all the selfishness has been removed.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: Nobody can fully understand the meaning of love unless he’s owned a dog. He can show you more honest affection with a flick of his tail than a man can gather through a lifetime of handshakes.
quotes.author: Gene Hill

quotes.quote: Men are tattooed with their special beliefs like so many South Sea Islanders; but a real human heart with divine love in it beats with the same glow under all the patterns of all earth's thousand tribes.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: The sound of a kiss is not so loud as that of a cannon, but its echo lasts a great deal longer.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Tell me whom you love and I will tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Houssaye

quotes.quote: No woman ever falls in love with a man unless she has a better opinion of him than he deserves.
quotes.author: Ed Howe

quotes.quote: You needn’t love your enemy, but if you refrain from telling lies about him, you are doing well enough.
quotes.author: Ed Howe

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life it the conviction that we are loved, loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love, I find, is like singing. Everyone can do enough to satisfy themselves, though it may not impress the neighbors as being very much.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda,

quotes.quote: Learn to love good books. There are treasures in books that all the money in the world cannot buy, but the poorest laborer can have for nothing.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world can not be seen or ever touched, they must be felt with the heart. We should do everything within reason to save a good relationship. But if we are constantly trying to save it, it's probably not a good relationship.
quotes.author: Javan

quotes.quote: Love is like the measles; we all have to go through it.
quotes.author: Jerome Klapka Jerome

quotes.quote: It is a beautiful necessity of our nature to love something.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: Love is like the measles, all the worse when it comes late in life.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: The love of life is necessary to the vigorous prosecution of any undertaking.
quotes.author: Dr. Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Romance, like the rabbit at the dog track, is the elusive, fake, and never attained reward which, for the benefit and amusement of our masters, keeps us running and thinking in safe circles.
quotes.author: Beverly Jones

quotes.quote: There shall be no love lost.
quotes.author: Ben Johnson

quotes.quote: Love is as much of an object as an obsession, everybody wants it, everybody seeks it, but few ever achieve it, those who do will cherish it, be lost in it, and among all, never . . . never forget it.
quotes.author: Curtis Judalet

quotes.quote: Somewhere there was once a Flower, a Stone, a Crystal, a Queen, a King, a Palace, a Lover and his Beloved, and this was long ago, on an Island somewhere in the ocean 5,000 years ago. . . . Such is Love, the Mystic Flower of the Soul. This is the Center, the Self.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Where love rules, there is no will to power; and where power predominates, there love is lacking. The one is the shadow of the other.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: A poet without love were a physical and metaphysical impossibility.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: People think love is an emotion. Love is good sense.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: The way to love anything is to realize it might be lost.
quotes.author: Kiekegaard

quotes.quote: When one has once fully entered the realm of love, the world no matter how imperfect becomes rich and beautiful, it consists solely of opportunities for love.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: I think that I shall never see A poem lovely as a tree.
quotes.author: Alfred Joyce Kilmer

quotes.quote: Only enemies speak the truth; friends and lovers lie endlessly, caught in the web of duty.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: There is a passion of reverence, almost of pity, mingling with the love of an honest man for a pure girl, which makes it the most exquisite, perhaps, of all human sentiments.
quotes.author: Mary St. Leger Kingsley

quotes.quote: If we could raise one generation with unconditional love, there would be no Hitlers. We need to teach the next generation of children from Day One that they are responsible for their lives. Mankind's greatest gift, also its greatest curse, is that we have free choice. We can make our choices built from love or from fear.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kubler Ross

quotes.quote: At the beginning and at the end of love, the two lovers are embarrassed to find themselves alone.
quotes.author: Jean de La Bruyre

quotes.quote: Absence diminishes mediocre passions and increases great ones, as wind blows out candles and fans fire.
quotes.author: Franois Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: If one judges love by the majority of its effects, it is more like hatred than like friendship.
quotes.author: Franois Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It is with true love as it is with ghosts; everyone talks about it, but few have seen it.
quotes.author: Franois Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: There are two sorts of constancy in love one arises from continually discovering in the loved person new subjects for love, the other arises from our making a merit of being constant.
quotes.author: Franois Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists or simulate it where it does not.
quotes.author: Franois Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: There is only one sort of love, but there are a thousand copies.
quotes.author: Franois Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The value of compassion cannot be overemphasized. Anyone can criticize. It takes a true believer to be compassionate. No greater burden can be born by an individual than to know no one cares or understands.
quotes.author: Arthur H. Stainback

quotes.quote: Don’t wait until you’re a man to be great. Be a great boy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Show me a man who cannot bother to do little things and I'll show you a man who cannot be trusted to do big things.
quotes.author: Lawrence D. Bell

quotes.quote: Greatness after all, ion spite of its name, appears to be not so much a certain size as a certain quality in human lives. It may be present in lives whose range is very small.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Put all your eggs in one basket and watch that basket.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Man is only truly great when he acts from the passions.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disreali

quotes.quote: Every great man is unique.
quotes.author: Ralpho Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Is it so bad, then, to be misunderstood. Pythagoras was misunderstood, and Socrates, and Jesus, and Luther, and Copernicus, and Galileo, and Newton, and every pure and wise spirit that ever took flesh. To be great is to be misunderstood.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Let us consider the nature of true greatness in men. The people who can catch hold of men’s minds and feelings and inspire them to do things bigger than themselves are the people who are remembered in history. . . . those who stir feelings and imagination and make men struggle toward perfection.
quotes.author: Henry Eyring

quotes.quote: Creativity means believing you have greatness.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: There are no great men, only great challenges that ordinary men are forced by circumstances to meet.
quotes.author: William F. Halsey

quotes.quote: Greatness does not approach him who is forever looking down.
quotes.author: Hitopadesa

quotes.quote: No great man ever complains of want of opportunity.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Great men are true men, the men in whom nature has succeeded. They are not extraordinary - they are in the true order. It is the other species of men who are not what they ought to be.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of greatness; some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Man is only truly great when he acts from his passions.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disreali

quotes.quote: In our society those who are in reality superior in intelligence can be accepted by their fellows only if they pretend they are not.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Well, I wouldn't say that I was in the great class, but I had a great time while I was trying to be great.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: The ultimate is not to win, but to reach within the depths of your capabilities and to compete against yourself.
quotes.author: Billy Mills

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of posterity to set matters right between those antagonists who, by their rivalry for greatness, divided a whole age.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Do not confuse notoriety and fame with greatness. . . . For you see, greatness is a measure of one's spirit, not a result of one's rank in human affairs.
quotes.author: Sherman Finesilver

quotes.quote: True greatness is the most ready to recognize and most willing to obey those simple outward laws which have been sanctioned by the experience of mankind.
quotes.author: Froude

quotes.quote: A great man will not trample upon a worm, nor sneak to an emperor.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Recipe for greatness? To bear up under loss, to fight the bitterness of defeat and the weakness of grief, to be victor over anger, to smile when tears are close, to resist evil men and base instincts, to hate and to love, to go on when it would seem good to die, to seek ever after the glory and the dream, to look up with unquenchable faith in something evermore about to be, that is what any man can do, and so be great.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.quote: There would be no great ones if there were no little ones.
quotes.author: George Herber

quotes.quote: A great man's greatest good luck is to die at the right time.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The man who is anybody and who does anything is surely going to be criticized, vilified, and misunderstood. This is a part of the penalty for greatness, and every great man understands it; and understands, too, that it is no proof of greatness. The final proof of greatness lies in being able to endure contumely without resentment.
quotes.author: Elbert Green Hubbard

quotes.quote: Greatness of name in the father oft-times overwhelms the son; they stand too near one another. The shadow kills the growth: so much, that we see the grandchild come more and oftener to be heir of the first.
quotes.author: Ben Johnson

quotes.quote: I think this is the most extraordinary collection of talent, of human knowledge, that has ever been gathered at the White House, with the possible exception of when Thomas Jefferson dined alone.
quotes.author: John Fitzgerald Kennedy

quotes.quote: I want it said of me by those who knew me best, that I always plucked a thistle and planted a flower where I thought a flower would grow.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If any man seeks for greatness, let him forget greatness and ask for truth, and he will find both.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: The great man is he who does not lose his child's heart.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: I'd rather be a great bad poet than a good bad poet.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: So when a great man dies For years beyond our ken The light he leaves behind him lies Upon the paths of men.
quotes.author: Johann Heinrich Pestalozzi

quotes.quote: If we are to be really great people, we must strive in good faith to play a great part in the world. We cannot avoid meeting great issues. All that we can determine for ourselves is whether we shall meet them well or ill.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Every great man is always being helped by everybody, for his gift is to get good out of all things and all persons.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: A man who has once perceived, however temporarily and however briefly, what makes greatness of soul, can no longer be happy if he allows himself to be petty, self-seeking, troubled by trivial misfortunes, dreading what fate may have in store for him. The man capable of greatness of soul will open wide the windows of his mind, letting the winds blow freely upon it from every portion of the universe. He will see himself and life and the world as truly as our human limitations will permit; realizing the brevity and minuteness of human life, he will realize also that in individual minds is concentrated whatever of value the known universe contains. And he will see that the man whose mind mirrors the world becomes in a sense as great as the world. In emancipation from the fears that beset the slave of circumstance he will experience a profound joy, and through all the vicissitudes of his outward life he will remain in the depths of his being a happy man.
quotes.author: Bertrand Arthur William Russell

quotes.quote: A desire for bigness has hurt many folks. Putting oneself in the limelight at the expense of others is a wrong idea of greatness. The secret of greatness rather than bigness is to acclimate oneself to one's place of service and be true to one's own convictions. A life of this kind of service will forever remain the measure of one's true greatness.
quotes.author: Richard W. Shelly, Jr.

quotes.quote: Some things have not changed since the dawn of history, and bid fair to last out time itself. One of these things is the capacity for greatness in man his capacity for being often the master of the event and sometimes even more the changer of the course of history itself. This capacity for greatness is a very precious gift, and we are under a danger in our day of stifling it.
quotes.author: Dr. William Clyde de Vane

quotes.quote: To achieve great things we must live as if we were never going to die.
quotes.author: Marquis de Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: Excellence is not a destination; it is a continuous journey that never ends.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Since most of us spend our lives doing ordinary tasks, the most important thing is to carry them out extraordinarily well.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

quotes.quote: Great crisis produce great men and great deeds of courage.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: He should sweep streets so well that all the host of heaven and earth will pause to say, 'Here lives a great street-sweeper who did his job well'
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: He who reigns within himself and rules his passions, desires, and fears is more than a king.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Only in growth, reform and change, paradoxically enough, is true security to be found.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The successful always has a number of projects planned, to which he looks forward. Anyone of them could change the course of his life overnight.
quotes.author: Mark Caine

quotes.quote: There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: When a man feels throbbing within him the power to do what he undertakes as well as it can possibly be done, this is happiness, this is success.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The great successful men of the world have used their imagination they think ahead and create their mental picture in all its details, filling in here, adding a little there, altering this a bit and that a bit, but steadily building - steadily building.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Success doesn't come to you, you go to it.
quotes.author: Marva Collins

quotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather in a lack of will.
quotes.author: Vincent T. Lombardi

quotes.quote: Most successful men have not achieved their distinction by having some new talent or opportunity presented to them. They have developed the opportunity that was at hand.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Would you like me to give you a formula for success? It's quite simple, really. Double your rate of failure. You are thinking of failure as the enemy of success. But it isn't at all. You can be discouraged by failure or you can learn from it, So go ahead and make mistakes. Make all you can. Because remember that’s where you will find success.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: It is truly said: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires great strength to decide what to do.
quotes.author: Chow Ching

quotes.quote: Only actions give life strength; only moderation gives it charm.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Our real problem, then, is not our strength today; it is rather the vital necessity of action today to ensure our strength tomorrow.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Life only demands from you the strength you possess. Only one feat is possible - not to have run away.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Strong men can always afford to be gentle. Only the weak are intent on giving as good as they get.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.author: J. F. Clarke

quotes.quote: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; They shall mount up with wings as eagles; They shall run, and not be weary; and They shall walk, and not faint.
quotes.author: [Isaiah 40:31] Bible

quotes.quote: The quality of strength lined with tenderness is an unbeatable combination, as are intelligence and necessity when unblunted by formal education.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Never letting the competition define you. Instead, you have to define yourself based on a point of view you care deeply about.
quotes.author: Tom Chappel

quotes.quote: Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't hit at all if it is honorably possible to avoid hitting, but never hit soft.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Strength is a matter of a made up mind.
quotes.author: John Beecher

quotes.quote: Don't expect to build up the weak by pulling down the strong.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, and nothing is so gentle as true strength.
quotes.author: Ralph Sockman

quotes.quote: What the lion cannot manage to do the fox can.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men! Do no pray for tasks equal to your powers. Pray for power equal to your tasks.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Few men during their lifetime come anywhere near exhausting the resources dwelling within them. There are deep wells of strength that are never used.
quotes.author: Richard E. Byrd

quotes.quote: Greatness lies not in being strong, but in the right use of strength.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The burden is equal to the horse's strength.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence but it comes from within.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can’t really be strong until you see a funny side to things.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Man must be arched and buttressed from within, else the temple wavers to the dust.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus

quotes.quote: When you are required to exhibit strength, it comes.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Prepare yourself for the world, as athletes used to do for their exercises; oil your mind and your manners, to give them the necessary suppleness and flexibility; strength alone will not do.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: It is true that we shall not be able to reach perfection, but in our struggle toward it we shall strengthen our characters and give stability to our ideas, so that, whilst ever advancing calmly in the same direction, we shall be rendered capable of applying the faculties with which we have been gifted to the best possible account.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If I had my life to live over again, I would have made a rule to read some poetry and listen to some music at least once a week; for perhaps the parts of my brain now atrophied would have thus been kept active through use. The loss of these tastes is a loss of happiness, and may possibly be injurious to the intellect, and more probably to the moral character, by enfeebling the emotional part of our nature.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: For strength to bear is found in duty alone, and he is blest indeed who learns to make the joy of others cure his own heartache.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Thus all below is strength, and all above is grace.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: If there is any responsibility in the cycle of life it must be that one generation owes to the next that strength by which it can come to face ultimate concerns in its own way.
quotes.author: Erik Erikson

quotes.quote: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
quotes.author: Jean De La Fontaine

quotes.quote: The very strength that protects the heart from injury is the strength that prevents the heart from enlarging to its intended greatness within. The song of the voice is sweet, but the song of the heart is the pure voice of heaven.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: By nature we have no defect that could not become a strength, no strength that could not become a defect.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: He who is plenteously provided for from within needs but little from without.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires great strength to decide on what to do.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: He knows not his own strength that hath not met adversity.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: There is no limit to what you can imagine. And with commitment, with effort, what you can imagine you can become. Put your mind to work for you. Believe that you can do it. The world will tell you that you can't. Yet, in your belief you'll find the strength, you'll find the ability, to do it anyway.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: There is [a] spiritual strength derived from the subjecting of the physical appetite to the will of the individual. "He who reigns within himself and rules passions, desires, and fears is more than king." If there were no other virtues in fasting but gaining strength of character, that alone would be sufficient justification for its universal acceptance.
quotes.author: David McKay

quotes.quote: There is nothing so strong as gentleness, and nothing so gentle as strength.
quotes.author: Leo Muir

quotes.quote: I do not attach much importance to America's bombs. I attach importance to her great vitality and integrity. The strength of America is deeper and more significant than her financial power.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: The Enoch situation recalls another quotation, far more recent, from President Spencer W. Kimball in his great bicentennial address: "We commit vast resources to the fabrication of . . . ships, planes, missiles, fortifications and depend on them for deliverance. When threatened, we become anti-enemy instead of pro-kingdom of God. . . . What are we to fear when the Lord is with us? Can we not take the Lord at his word and exercise a particle of faith in him? . . . We must leave off the worship of modern-day idols and a reliance on the arm of flesh." Mr. Nixon has an answer to that one: Faith without strength is futile. What a revealing statement! Faith is the source of strength, the very power by which the worlds were created. To say it is helpless without military backing recalls an ancient saw: "I trust God but I feel better with money in the bank." In the spirit of the times we preach that to expect security without a four-man bodyguard is futile, when security is not to need a bodyguard; that charity without a guaranteed profit is futile, when charity means asking no profit; that free agency without strict supervision is futile, and so on. Mr. Nixon rejects Napoleon's dictum that in the end it is the spirit that always wins. Napoleon should know, but Nixon will have none of that: that goes only for the long run, he says, but "in that short run in which we all live, the sword is the essential shield for the spirit," and "in the final analysis victory will go to the side . . . [with the] power." "Power is the ability to make things happen, . . . to set the course of history." "The uses of power cannot be divorced from the purposes of power." In Mr. Nixon's book, God is indeed on the side of the big battalions.
quotes.author: Hugh Nibley

quotes.quote: In lazy apathy let stoics boast, their virtue fix'd: 't is fix'd as in a frost; contracted all, retiring to the breast; but strength of mind is exercise, not rest.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: God does not take away trials or carry us over them, but strengthens us through them.
quotes.author: Pusey

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, "I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along." . . . You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: This is the law of the Yukon, that only the strong shall thrive; that surely the weak shall perish, and only the fit survive.
quotes.author: Robert W. Service

quotes.quote: There is a growing strength in women, but it is in the forehead, not in the forearm.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: Native vigor of impulses and desires conserved by education and experience, the establishment of inner harmony and cooperation among the powers and capacities of the soul, the formation of a life purpose, and the direction of the individual life in accordance with the eternal principles of right that underlie human progress, these are the elements of both strength and righteousness in human character.
quotes.author: Edward Sisson

quotes.quote: Above all challenge yourself. You may well surprise yourself at what strengths you have, what you can accomplish.
quotes.author: Cecile Springer
