quotes.quote: A patriot must always be ready to defend his country against his government.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The business of government is to keep the government out of business - that is, unless business needs government aid.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: It's a good thing we don't get all the government we pay for.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The best minds in government? If any were, business would hire them away.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The greatest purveyor of violence in the world today - my own government.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Must a government be too strong for the liberties of its people or too weak to maintain its own existence?
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Make the people sovereign and the poor will use the machinery of government to dispossess the rich.
quotes.author: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.quote: Remember that a government big enough to give you everything you want is also big enough to take away everything you have.
quotes.author: Barry Goldwater

quotes.quote: All government, of course, is against liberty.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Men whose lives are doubtful want a strong government and a hot religion.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: It is a very sobering feeling to be up in space and realize that one's safety factor was determined by the lowest bidder on a government contract.
quotes.author: Alan Shepherd

quotes.quote: The philosophy of the school room in one generation will be the philosophy of government in the next.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: We are fast approaching the stage of the ultimate inversion: the stage where the government is free to do anything it pleases, while the citizens may act only by permission; which is the stage of the darkest periods of human history, the stage of rule by brute force.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: If human beings are fundamentally good, no government is necessary; if they are fundamentally bad, any government, being composed of human beings, would be bad also.
quotes.author: Fred Woodworth

quotes.quote: Whenever you have efficient government, you have a dictatorship.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: Government's view of the economy could be summed up in a few short phrases: If it moves, tax it. If it keeps moving, regulate it. And if it stops moving, subsidise it.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Whenever the people are well-informed, they can be trusted with their own government.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Government is not the doctor. It is the disease.
quotes.author: H. S. Ferns

quotes.quote: Democracy must be something more than two wolves and a sheep voting on what to have for dinner.
quotes.author: James Bovard

quotes.quote: The twentieth century has been characterized by three developments of great political importance: the growth of democracy, the growth of corporate power, and the growth of corporate propaganda as a means of protecting corporate power against democracy.
quotes.author: Alex Carey

quotes.quote: The people have spoken but it is going to take a little while to determine exactly what they have said.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: Without God, democracy will not and cannot long endure.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Democracy means simply the bludgeoning of the people by the people for the people.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Only a government that is rich and safe can afford to be a democracy, for democracy is the most expensive and nefarious kinds of government ever heard of on earth.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Democracy arises out of the notion that those who are equal in any respect are equal in all respects; because men are equally free, they claim to be absolutely equal.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A democracy is nothing more than mob rule, where fifty-one percent of the people may take away the rights of the other forty-nine.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Democracy is a pathetic belief in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Democracy is a process by which the people are free to choose the man who will get the blame.
quotes.author: Dr. Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Democracy encourages the majority to decide things about which the majority is ignorant.
quotes.author: John Simon

quotes.quote: Democracy is also a form of worship. It is the worship of Jackals by Jackasses.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: People shouldn't be afraid of their government. Governments should be afraid of their people.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: In a room where people unanimously maintain a conspiracy of silence, one word of truth sounds like a pistol shot.
quotes.author: Czesław Miłosz

quotes.quote: Freedom in capitalist society always remains about the same as it was in ancient Greek republics: Freedom for slave owners.
quotes.author: Vladimir Ilich Lenin

quotes.quote: Our great democracies still tend to think that a stupid man is more likely to be honest than a clever man, and our politicians take advantage of this prejudice by pretending to be even more stupid than nature made them.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: I am a firm believer in the people. If given the truth, they can be depended upon to meet any national crisis. The great point is to bring them the real facts, and beer.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Propaganda is to a democracy what the bludgeon is to a totalitarian state.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: I do not know if the people of the United States would vote for superior men if they ran for office, but there can be no doubt that such men do not run.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: Democracy consists of choosing your dictators, after they've told you what you think it is you want to hear.
quotes.author: Alan Coren

quotes.quote: The great thing about democracy is that it gives every voter a chance to do something stupid.
quotes.author: Art Spander

quotes.quote: Democracy is the recurrent suspicion that more than half of the people are right more than half the time.
quotes.author: EB White

quotes.quote: In democracy it's your vote that counts; In feudalism it's your count that votes.
quotes.author: Mogens Jallberg

quotes.quote: It's not the voting that's democracy, it's the counting.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: God created war so that Americans would learn geography.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is not enough to conquer; one must also know how to seduce.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: War is what happens when language fails.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: All war must be just the killing of strangers against whom you feel no personal animosity; strangers whom, in other circumstances, you would help if you found them in trouble, and who would help you if you needed it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I am not only a pacifist but a militant pacifist. I am willing to fight for peace. Nothing will end war unless the people themselves refuse to go to war.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Older men declare war. But it is youth that must fight and die.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: The real and lasting victories are those of peace, and not of war.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emmerson

quotes.quote: I have no doubt that we will be successful in harnessing the sun's energy... If sunbeams were weapons of war, we would have had solar energy centuries ago.
quotes.author: Sir George Porter

quotes.quote: There are causes worth dying for, but none worth killing for.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: In time of war, when truth is so precious, it must be attended by a bodyguard of lies.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Love is like war; easy to begin but very hard to stop.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Never think that war, no matter how necessary, nor how justified, is not a crime.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: What difference does it make to the dead, the orphans and the homeless, whether the mad destruction is wrought under the name of totalitarianism or in the holy name of liberty or democracy?
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We used to wonder where war lived, what it was that made it so vile. And now we realize that we know where it lives, that it is inside ourselves.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Listen up - there's no war that will end all wars.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: It is only the dead who have seen the end of war.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: One cannot simultaneously prevent and prepare for war.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is no flag large enough to cover the shame of killing innocent people.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: Men are at war with each other because each man is at war with himself.
quotes.author: Francis Meehan

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to pick the gun up to put the Gun down.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: An inglorious peace is better than a dishonorable war.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: When the rich wage war it's the poor who die.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The object of war is not to die for your country but to make the other bastard die for his.
quotes.author: General George S. Patton

quotes.quote: If everyone fought for their own convictions there would be no war.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: How is it possible to have a civil war?
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The only real diplomacy ever performed by a diplomat is in deceiving their own people after their dumbness has got them into a war.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: You can have peace. Or you can have freedom. Don't ever count on having both at once.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: There has never been a protracted war from which a country has benefited.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather, we should thank God that such men lived.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: A prisoner of war is a man who tries to kill you and fails, and then asks you not to kill him.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracián

quotes.quote: War does not determine who is right - only who is left.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The war against terrorism is terrorism.
quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

quotes.quote: Do you think it’s possible for an entire nation to be insane?
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Peace is more than the absence of war. Peace is accord. Harmony.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: In war, there are no unwounded soldiers.
quotes.author: Jose Narosky

quotes.quote: The choice is not between violence and nonviolence but between nonviolence and nonexistence.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: War is a poor chisel to carve out tomorrow.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: In times of war, the law falls silent.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: No one won the last war, and no one will win the next war.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We make war that we may live in peace.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It is not enough to win a war; it is more important to organize the peace.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Those who can win a war well can rarely make a good peace and those who could make a good peace would never have won the war.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: In wars, boy, fools kill other fools for foolish causes.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Americans play to win at all times. I wouldn't give a hoot and hell for a man who lost and laughed. That's why Americans have never lost nor ever lose a war.
quotes.author: General George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Like Alexander the Great and Caesar, I’m out to conquer the world. But first I have to stop at Walmart and pick up some supplies.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: To wage a war for a purely moral reason is as absurd as to ravish a woman for a purely moral reason.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: The nuclear arms race is like two sworn enemies standing waist deep in gasoline, one with three matches, the other with five.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Cry 'Havoc', and let slip the dogs of war, that this foul deed shall smell above the earth with carrion men, groaning for burial.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You ask, what is our aim? I can answer in one word. It is victory, victory at all costs, victory in spite of all terror, victory, however long and hard the road may be; for without victory, there is no survival.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: If war is ever lawful, then peace is sometimes sinful.
quotes.author: CS Lewis

quotes.quote: Nations have recently been led to borrow billions for war; no nation has ever borrowed largely for education... no nation is rich enough to pay for both war and civilization. We must make our choice; we cannot have both.
quotes.author: Abraham Flexner

quotes.quote: War is the trade of kings.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: I find war detestable but those who praise it without participating in it even more so.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland

quotes.quote: If you think of humanity as one large body, then war is like suicide, or at best, self-mutilation.
quotes.author: Jerome P Crabb

quotes.quote: Don't talk to me about atrocities in war; all war is an atrocity.
quotes.author: Lord Kitchener

quotes.quote: All war is deception.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: War makes rattling good history; but peace is poor reading.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Vietnam was the first war ever fought without any censorship. Without censorship, things can get terribly confused in the public mind.
quotes.author: General William Westmoreland

quotes.quote: Politics is war without bloodshed while war is politics with bloodshed.
quotes.author: Mao Tse-Tung

quotes.quote: War is like love, it always finds a way.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: War will disappear only when men shall take no part whatever in violence and shall be ready to suffer every persecution that their abstention will bring them. It is the only way to abolish war.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: We love peace, but not peace at any price. There is a peace more destructive of the manhood of living man, than was is destructive of the body. Chains are worse than bayonets.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: War is only a cowardly escape from the problems of peace.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: All delays are dangerous in war.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: There was never a good war or a bad peace.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: In war, truth is the first casualty.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: It's funny how those who are most pro-war are almost always the guys who never had to fight in one.
quotes.author: Jerome P Crabb

quotes.quote: He who sweats more in peace, bleeds less in war.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Wars do not end wars any more than an extraordinarily large conflagration does away with the fire hazard.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: War is so unjust and ugly that all who wage it must try to stifle the voice of conscience within themselves.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: After a long, hopeless war, people will settle for peace, at almost any price.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: You can't say civilization don't advance... in every war they kill you in a new way.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: War is a severe doctor; but it sometimes heals grievances.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: As long as war is regarded as wicked, it will always have its fascination. When it is looked upon as vulgar, it will cease to be popular.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A mind at peace does not engender wars.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: War is an instrument entirely inefficient toward redressing wrong; and multiplies, instead of indemnifying losses.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Wars of pen and ink often lead to wars of cannon and bayonets.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: War is not an adventure. It is a disease. It is like typhus.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.quote: No catalogue of horrors ever kept men from war. Before the war you always think that it's not you that dies. But you will die, brother, if you go to it long enough.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemmingway

quotes.quote: War seldom enters but where wealth allures.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: When music and courtesy are better understood and appreciated, there will be no war.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Peace is not the absence of war but the presence of justice.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: I hate war as only a soldier who has lived it can, only as one who has seen its brutality, its futility, its stupidity.
quotes.author: Dwight David Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Give me an army of West Point graduates and I'll win a battle. Give me a handful of Texas Aggies, and I'll win the war.
quotes.author: General George S. Patton

quotes.quote: You say it is the good cause that hallows even war? I tell you: it is the good war that hallows every cause.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Only the winners decide what were war crimes.
quotes.author: Gary Wills

quotes.quote: Once we have a war there is only one thing to do. It must be won. For defeat brings worse things than any that can ever happen in war.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemmingway

quotes.quote: Making peace, I have found, is much harder than making war.
quotes.author: Gerry Adams

quotes.quote: War is evil, but it is often the lesser evil.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: There is no avoiding war; it can only be postponed to the advantage of others.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: I have a scheme for stopping war. It's this -- no nation is allowed to enter a war till they have paid for the last one.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: War is a game that is played with a smile. If you can't smile, grin. If you can't grin, keep out of the way till you can.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The war against hunger is truly mankind's war of liberation.
quotes.author: John Fitzgerald Kennedy

quotes.quote: If any man says he hates war more than I do, he better have a knife, that's all I have to say.
quotes.author: Jack Handy

quotes.quote: Thus, what is of supreme importance in war is to attack the enemy's strategy.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: History teaches that war begins when governments believe the price of aggression is cheap.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: When women are depressed, they eat or go shopping. Men invade another country. It's a whole different way of thinking.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Women's Liberation is just a lot of foolishness. It's the men who are discriminated against. They can't bear children. And no one's likely to do anything about that.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: I see when men love women they give but a little of their lives, but women, when they love, give everything.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I want a man whose kind and understanding. Is that too much to ask of a millionaire?
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Men's minds are raised to the level of the women with whom they associate.
quotes.author: Alexander Dumas

quotes.quote: What would men be without women? Scarce, sir, mighty scarce.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Part of the reason that men seem so much less loving than women is that men's behavior is measured with a feminine ruler.
quotes.author: Francesca M. Cancian

quotes.quote: Only one man in a thousand is a leader of men, the other 999 follow women.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: When a man talks dirty to a woman, its sexual harassment. When a woman talks dirty to a man, it's $3.95 a minute.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Man does not control his own fate. The women in his life do that for him.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Men want the same thing from their underwear that they want from women: a little bit of support, and a little bit of freedom.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Lonely men seek companionship. Lonely women sit at home and wait. They never meet.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A pessimist is a man who thinks all women are bad. An optimist is one who hopes they are.
quotes.author: Chancey Depew

quotes.quote: Boys will be boys, and so will a lot of middle-aged men.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Men play the game; women know the score.
quotes.author: Roger Woddis

quotes.quote: On the one hand, we'll never experience childbirth. On the other hand, we can open all our own jars.
quotes.author: Bruce Willis

quotes.quote: Men are just as sensitive, and in some ways more sensitive, than women are.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Few women care what a man looks like, and a good thing too.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: A man's brain has a more difficult time shifting from thinking to feeling than a women's brain does.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: The analysis of man discloses three chemical elements — a job, a meal and a woman.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Here's all you have to know about men and women: women are crazy, men are stupid. And the main reason women are crazy is that men are stupid.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The only difference between men and boys is the cost of their toys.
quotes.author: Doris Rowland

quotes.quote: A retired husband is often a wife's full-time job.
quotes.author: Ella Harris

quotes.quote: Why are women so much more interesting to men than men are to women?
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Never trust a husband too far, nor a bachelor too near.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Any fool knows men and women think differently at times, but the biggest difference is this. Men forget, but never forgive; women forgive, but never forget.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: See, the problem is that God gives men a brain and a penis, and only enough blood to run one at a time.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: I like men who have a future and women who have a past.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Like a compass needle that points north, a man's accusing finger always finds a woman. Always.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Women may be able to fake orgasms, but men can fake whole relationships.
quotes.author: James Shubert

quotes.quote: The old theory was "Marry an older man, because they're more mature." But the new theory is: "Men don't mature. marry a younger one."
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Men can read maps better than women. 'Cause only the male mind could conceive of one inch equaling a hundred miles.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: The more I see of men, the more I like dogs.
quotes.author: Germaine de Staël

quotes.quote: Men want a woman whom they can turn on and off like a light switch.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: It’s absolutely unfair for women to say that guys only want one thing: sex. We also want food.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: As long as she thinks of a man, nobody objects to a woman thinking.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Sometimes a woman needs a man for company, no matter how useless he is.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: If a man hasn't what's necessary to make a woman love him, it's his fault, not hers.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Telling lies is a fault in a boy, an art in a lover, an accomplishment in a bachelor, and second-nature in a married man.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Men should think twice before making widowhood women's only path to power.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: I require three things in a man: he must be handsome, ruthless, and stupid.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: A woman's flattery may inflate a man's head a little; but her criticism goes straight to his heart, and contracts it so that it can never again hold quite as much love for her.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: It is a well-documented fact that guys will not ask for directions. This is a biological thing. This is why it takes several million sperm cells... to locate a female egg, despite the fact that the egg is, relative to them, the size of Wisconsin.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: The history of men's opposition to women's emancipation is more interesting perhaps than the story of that emancipation itself.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: If I had a dollar for every time a random woman walked up to me and tried to seduce me, I'd have 50 cents. That's assuming drag queens are half price.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: The follies which a man regrets most, in his life, are those he didn't commit when he had the opportunity.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: A gentleman is simply a patient wolf.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.quote: Every man needs two women: a quiet home-maker, and a thrilling nymph.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Can you imagine a world without men? No crime and lots of happy fat women.
quotes.author: Nicole Hollander

quotes.quote: A man can become so accustomed to the thought of his own faults that he will begin to cherish them as charming little "personal characteristics”.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: When a man of forty falls in love with a girl of twenty, it isn't her youth he is seeking but his own.
quotes.author: Lenore Coffee

quotes.quote: The first time you buy a house you see how pretty the paint is and buy it. The second time you look to see if the basement has termites. It's the same with men.
quotes.author: Lupe Velez

quotes.quote: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Well-behaved women rarely make history.
quotes.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

quotes.quote: Ah, women. They make the highs higher and the lows more frequent.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: According to a recent survey, men say the first thing they notice about a woman is their eyes, and women say the first thing they notice about men is they're a bunch of liars.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Women have a wonderful instinct about things. They can discover everything except the obvious.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Women, can't live with them, can't live without them.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: A woman can defend her virtue from men much more easily than she can protect her reputation from women.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The bravest thing that men do is love women.
quotes.author: Mort Sahl

quotes.quote: We women talk too much, nevertheless we only say half of what we know.
quotes.author: Nancy Astor

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man’s last romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Women always worry about the things that men forget; men always worry about the things women remember.
quotes.author: Majorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: Women are like apples on trees, the best ones are on the top of the tree. The men don't want to reach for the good ones because they are afraid of falling and don't want to get hurt. Instead, they just get the rotten apples from the ground that aren't so good but easy. So, the apples at the top think something is wrong with them, when in reality they are amazing. They just have to wait for the right man to come along, the one who's brave enough to climb all the way to the top because they value quality.
quotes.author: Pete Wentz

quotes.quote: Most women have all other women as adversaries; most men have all other men as their allies.
quotes.author: Frank Gelett Burgess

quotes.quote: Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea.
quotes.author: Robert A Heinlein

quotes.quote: Women have hunger two-fold, shyness four-fold, daring six-fold, and lust eight-fold as compared to men.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Women are considered deep - why? Because one can never discover any bottom to them. Women are not even shallow.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Most of us women like men, you know; it's just that we find them a constant disappointment.
quotes.author: Clare Short

quotes.quote: Women made us lose paradise, but how frequently we find it again in their arms.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Even the wisest men make fools of themselves about women, and even the most foolish women are wise about men.
quotes.author: Theodor Reik

quotes.quote: Why haven't women got labels on their foreheads saying, "Danger: Government Health Warning: Women can be dangerous to your brains, genitals, current account, confidence, razor blades and good standing among your friends”.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of women: those who want power in the world, and those who want power in bed.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Kennedy

quotes.quote: You see a lot of smart guys with dumb women, but you hardly ever see a smart woman with a dumb guy.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Whatever women do they must do twice as well as men to be thought half as good. Luckily, this is not difficult.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Women should be obscene and not heard.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Clever and attractive women do not want to vote; they are willing to let men govern as long as they govern men.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: On one issue, at least, men and women agree: they both distrust women.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Women are like stars there are millions of them out there, but only one can make dreams come true.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: I disregard the proportions, the measures, the tempo of the ordinary world. I refuse to live in the ordinary world as ordinary women. To enter ordinary relationships. I want ecstasy. I am a neurotic -- in the sense that I live in my world. I will not adjust myself to the world. I am adjusted to myself.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Women don't want to hear what you think. Women want to hear what they think -- in a deeper voice.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft were written by men.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: After all, Ginger Rogers did everything that Fred Astaire did. She just did it backwards and in high heels.
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.quote: Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Give a girl an education and introduce her properly into the world, and ten to one but she has the means of settling well, without further expense to anybody.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Women have two weapons - cosmetics and tears.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A man’s face is his autobiography. A women's face is her work of fiction.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Women are never disarmed by compliments. Men always are. That is the difference between the sexes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Why is it men are permitted to be obsessed about their work, but women are only permitted to be obsessed about men?
quotes.author: Barbara Streisand

quotes.quote: Women are superior to men. I don't even think we're equal.
quotes.author: Leonor Sullivan

quotes.quote: A witty woman is a treasure’ a witty beauty is a power.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: No woman gets an orgasm from shining the kitchen floor.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: Men are taught to apologize for their weaknesses, women for their strengths.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: Women need real moments of solitude and self-reflection to balance out how much of ourselves we give away.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Most women set out to try to change a man, and when they have changed him they don't like him.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: A man can be short and dumpy and getting bald but if he has fire, women will like him.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Women with "pasts" interest men because men hope that history will repeat itself.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: And verily, a woman need know but one man well, in order to understand all men; whereas a man may know all women and understand not one of them.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: The happiest women, like the happiest nations, have no history.
quotes.author: George Elliot

quotes.quote: What would women do if they could not cry? What poor, defenceless creatures they would be.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: There are only two types of women - goddesses and doormats.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: If women didn't exist, all the money in the world would have no meaning.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: All women should know how to take care of children. Most of them will have a husband someday.
quotes.author: Franklin P Jones

quotes.quote: The only really happy folk are married women and single men.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Women's Tongues are as sharp as two-edged Swords, and wound as much, when they are angered.
quotes.author: Margaret Cavendish

quotes.quote: I know enough to know that no woman should ever marry a man who hated his mother.
quotes.author: Martha Gellhorn

quotes.quote: She's the sort of woman who lives for others - you can tell the others by their hunted expression.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: If men swear that they want to harm you when you are asleep, you can go to sleep. If women say so, stay awake.
quotes.author: African proverb

quotes.quote: I asked a Burmese why women, after centuries of following their men, now walk ahead. He said there were many unexploded land mines since the war.
quotes.author: Robert Mueller

quotes.quote: In less enlightened times, the best way to impress women was to own a hot car. But women wised up and realized it was better to buy their own hot cars so they wouldn't have to ride around with jerks.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Women are happier in the love they inspire than in that which they feel; men are just the contrary.
quotes.author: E. P. Beauchene

quotes.quote: The woman who tells her age is either too young to have anything to lose or too old to have anything to gain.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If I were a girl, I'd despair. The supply of good women far exceeds that of the men who deserve them.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: The difference between men and women is that, if given the choice between saving the life of an infant or catching a fly ball, a woman will automatically choose to save the infant, without even considering if there's a man on base.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Next to the wound, what women make best is the bandage.
quotes.author: Barbey d' Aureuilly

quotes.quote: Women are not going to be equal outside the home until men are equal in it.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: When women go wrong, men go right after them.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Women wish to be loved without a why or a wherefore; not because they are pretty, or good, or well-bred, or graceful, or intelligent, but because they are themselves.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: The word and works of God is quite clear, that women were made either to be wives or prostitutes.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: The more education a woman has, the wider the gap between men's and women's earnings for the same work.
quotes.author: Sandra Day

quotes.quote: Women are never stronger than when they arm themselves with their weaknesses.
quotes.author: Madame Marie du Deffand

quotes.quote: I want women to be liberated and still be able to have a nice ass and shake it.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: If all men are born free, how is it that all women are born slaves?
quotes.author: Mary Astell

quotes.quote: Plain women know more about men than beautiful ones do. But beautiful women don't need to know about men. It's the men who have to know about beautiful women.
quotes.author: Katherine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Some women can be fooled all of the time, and all women can be fooled some of the time, but the same woman can't be fooled by the same man in the same way more than half of the time.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Men, their rights, and nothing more; women, their rights, and nothing less.
quotes.author: Susan B Anthony

quotes.quote: If women ran the world we wouldn't have wars, just intense negotiations every 28 days.
quotes.author: Robin Willliams

quotes.quote: You know that look women get when they want sex? Me neither.
quotes.author: Drew Carey

quotes.quote: Guys are simple... women are not simple and they always assume that men must be just as complicated as they are, only way more mysterious. The whole point is guys are not thinking much. They are just what they appear to be. Tragically.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Men reach their sexual peak at eighteen. Women reach theirs at thirty-five. Do you get the feeling that God is playing a practical joke?
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: There are a number of mechanical devices which increase sexual arousal, particularly in women. Chief among these is the Mercedes-Benz 380SL convertible.
quotes.author: PJ O’Rourke

quotes.quote: Among men, sex sometimes results in intimacy; among women, intimacy sometimes results in sex.
quotes.author: Barbara Cartland

quotes.quote: Beauty is the wisdom of women. Wisdom is the beauty of men.
quotes.author: Chinese proverb

quotes.quote: Women complain about sex more often than men. Their gripes fall into two major categories: (1) Not enough. (2) Too much.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Women speak two languages - one of which is verbal.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Beware of the man who denounces women writers; his penis is tiny and he cannot spell.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: They say women talk too much. If you have worked in Congress you know that the filibuster was invented by men.
quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.quote: I'm not denying the women are foolish: God almighty made 'em to match the men.
quotes.author: George Elliot

quotes.quote: Instead of warning pregnant women not to drink, I think female alcoholics should be told not to fuck.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: After about 20 years of marriage, I'm finally starting to scratch the surface of what women want. And I think the answer lies somewhere between conversation and chocolate.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.quote: Money and women are the most sought after and the least known about of any two things we have.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Feminism is the radical notion that women are people.
quotes.author: Marie Shear

quotes.quote: Anyone who believes that men are the equal of women has never seen a man trying to wrap a Christmas present.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Women still remember the first kiss after men have forgotten the last.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: Women are nothing but machines for producing children.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Women are like elephants. I like to look at 'em, but I wouldn't want to own one.
quotes.author: WC Fields

quotes.quote: After an acquaintance of ten minutes many women will exchange confidences that a man would not reveal to a lifelong friend.
quotes.author: Page Smith

quotes.quote: Women are like teabags. We don't know our true strength until we are in hot water!
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If women want any rights more than they's got, why don't they just take them, and not be talking about it.
quotes.author: Sojourner Truth

quotes.quote: Misogynist: A man who hates women as much as women hate one another.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: I always play women I would date.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Many women long for what eludes them, and like not what is offered them.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: A woman never forgets the men she could have had; a man, the women he couldn't.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: Whether they give or refuse, it delights women just the same to have been asked.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: One can find women who have never had one love affair, but it is rare indeed to find any who have had only one.
quotes.author: François de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Only men who are not interested in women are interested in women's clothes. Men who like women never notice what they wear.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Women will forgive anything. Otherwise, the race would have died out long ago.
quotes.author: Robert A Heinlein

quotes.quote: The trouble with some women is that they get all excited about nothing - and then marry him.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: Women prefer emotions to reasoning.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: I haven't trusted polls since I read that 62% of women had affairs during their lunch hour. I've never met a woman in my life who would give up lunch for sex.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Women like silent men. They think they're listening.
quotes.author: Marcel Achard

quotes.quote: God made man stronger but not necessarily more intelligent. He gave women intuition and femininity. And, used properly, that combination easily jumbles the brain of any man I've ever met.
quotes.author: Farrah Fawcett

quotes.quote: As usual there is a great woman behind every idiot.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: A woman who doesn’t wear perfume has no future.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: For most of history, Anonymous was a woman.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Women need a reason to have sex. Men just need a place.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.quote: There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I would always rather be happy than dignified.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: When a man gives his opinion, he's a man. When a woman gives her opinion, she's a bitch.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: In politics, if you want anything said, ask a man. If you want anything done, ask a woman.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: There is more to sex appeal than just measurements. I don't need a bedroom to prove my womanliness. I can convey just as much sex appeal, picking apples off a tree or standing in the rain.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Every man I meet wants to protect me. I can't figure out what from.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: It is a woman's business to get married as soon as possible, and a man's to keep unmarried as long as possible.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: No woman really wants a man to carry her off; she only wants him to want to do it.
quotes.author: Barbara Mertz

quotes.quote: The only time a woman really succeeds in changing a man is when he is a baby.
quotes.author: Natalie Wood

quotes.quote: Women marry men hoping they will change. Men marry women hoping they will not. So, each is inevitably disappointed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In the sex war, thoughtlessness is the weapon of the male, vindictiveness of the female.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Bachelors know more about women than married men; if they didn't they'd be married too.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Marriage is for women the commonest mode of livelihood, and the total amount of undesired sex endured by women is probably greater in marriage than in prostitution.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: God's great cosmic joke on the human race was requiring that men and women live together in marriage.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The proper basis for marriage is mutual misunderstanding.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The trouble with many married people is that they are trying to get more out of marriage than there is in it.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Remember that a successful marriage depends on two things: (1) finding the right person and (2) being the right person.
quotes.author: Carrie P Snow

quotes.quote: How marriage ruins a man! It is as demoralizing as cigarettes, and far more expensive.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that's what you're looking for, go live with a car battery.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: Marriage is neither heaven nor hell, it is simply purgatory.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There is no perfect marriage, for there are no perfect men.
quotes.author: French proverb

quotes.quote: Marriage is give and take. You'd better give it to her or she'll take it anyway.
quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

quotes.quote: The formula for a happy marriage? It's the same as the one for living in California: when you find a fault, don't dwell on it.
quotes.author: Jay Trachman

quotes.quote: Marriage is when a man and woman become as one; the trouble starts when they try to decide which one.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Marriage is a great institution, but I'm not ready for an institution.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Let us now set forth one of the fundamental truths about marriage: the wife is in charge.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The husband who wants a happy marriage should learn to keep his mouth shut and his check book open.
quotes.author: Groucho Marks

quotes.quote: Sensual pleasures have the fleeting brilliance of a comet; a happy marriage has the tranquility of a lovely sunset.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Before marriage, a man will go home and lie awake all night thinking about something you said; after marriage, he'll go to sleep before you finish saying it.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: A liberated woman is one who has sex before marriage and a job after.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Marriage is three parts love and seven parts forgiveness of sins.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Marriage is an adventure, like going to war.
quotes.author: GK Chesterton

quotes.quote: Love is the dawn of marriage, and marriage is the sunset of love.
quotes.author: French proverb

quotes.quote: Marriage is the process of finding out what kind of man your wife would have preferred.
quotes.author: Jay Trachman

quotes.quote: Marriage is the one subject on which all women agree and all men disagree.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: One advantage of marriage is that, when you fall out of love with him or he falls out of love with you, it keeps you together until you fall in again.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: Marriage is the only war in which you sleep with the enemy.
quotes.author: French proverb

quotes.quote: Politics doesn't make strange bedfellows, marriage does.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Only choose in marriage a woman whom you would choose as a friend if she were a man.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Pleasure for one hour, a bottle of wine. Pleasure for one year a marriage; but pleasure for a lifetime, a garden.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Women are the only exploited group in history to have been idealized into powerlessness.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Show me a woman who doesn't feel guilty and I'll show you a man.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: There's a way of transferring funds that is even faster than electronic banking. It's called marriage.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Marriage is popular because it combines the maximum of temptation with the maximum of opportunity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Marriage is nature's way of keeping us from fighting with strangers.
quotes.author: Alan King

quotes.quote: You could talk about same-sex marriage, but people who have been married (say) 'It's the same sex all the time.'
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: After a few years of marriage a man can look right at a woman without seeing her and a woman can see right through a man without looking at him.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: All men should freely use those seven words which have the power to make any marriage run smoothly: You know dear, you may be right.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I have yet to hear a man ask for advice on how to combine marriage and a career.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Marriage is the miracle that transforms a kiss from a pleasure into a duty.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Marriage resembles a pair of shears, so joined that they cannot be separated, often moving in opposite directions, yet always punishing anyone who comes in between them.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: The heart of marriage is memories; and if the two of you happen to have the same ones and can savor your reruns, then your marriage is a gift from the gods.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The one charm about marriage is that it makes a life of deception absolutely necessary for both parties.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I think men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage. They've experienced pain and bought jewelry.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a coffin and each kid is like another nail.
quotes.author: Dan Castellaneta/Homer Simpson

quotes.quote: In marriage, as in war, it is permitted to take every advantage of the enemy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It was a perfect marriage. She didn't want to and he couldn't.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: Before marriage a man yearns for a woman. Afterward the y is silent.
quotes.author: WA Clarke

quotes.quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a beleaguered fortress: those who are outside want to get in, and those inside want to get out.
quotes.author: French proverb

quotes.quote: Twenty years of romance makes a woman look like a ruin; but twenty years of marriage make her something like a public building.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It is always incomprehensible to a man that a woman should refuse an offer of marriage.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Love may be blind, but marriage is a real eye-opener.
quotes.author: Pauline Thomason

quotes.quote: Any woman who still thinks marriage is a fifty-fifty proposition is only proving that she doesn't understand either men or percentages.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Marriage is the operation by which a woman's vanity and a man's egotism are extracted without an anesthetic.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Marriage is a very good thing, but I think it's a mistake to make a habit out of it.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Take care of him. And make him feel important. And if you can do that, you'll have a happy and wonderful marriage. Like two out of every ten couples.
quotes.author: Neil Simon

quotes.quote: Love the quest; marriage the conquest; divorce the inquest.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
quotes.author: Balzac

quotes.quote: A marriage certificate is just another word for a work permit.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: All tragedies are finished by a death, all comedies are ended by a marriage.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: If you lose your job, your marriage and your mind all in one week, try to lose your mind first, because then the other stuff won't matter that much.
quotes.author: Jack Handy

quotes.quote: Love is an ideal thing, marriage a real thing; a confusion of the real with the ideal never goes unpunished.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads which sew people together through the years. That is what makes a marriage last, more than passion or even sex.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: Marriage is a bribe to make a housekeeper think she's a householder.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Marriage is a matter of give and take, but so far I haven't been able to find anybody who'll take what I have to give.
quotes.author: Cass Daley

quotes.quote: Marriage - a book of which the first chapter is written in poetry and the remaining chapters in prose.
quotes.author: Beverley Nichols

quotes.quote: Before marriage, a man declares that he would lay down his life to serve you; after marriage, he won't even lay down his newspaper to talk to you.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: They asked her (Ruth Graham) did she ever think about divorce and she said, 'No, I've never thought of divorce in all these 35 years of marriage, but,' she said, 'I did think of murder a few times’.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Love is often the fruit of marriage.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: My wife and I tried to breakfast together, but we had to stop or our marriage would have been wrecked.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Marriage is about love. Divorce is about money.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a cage; one sees the birds outside desperate to get in, and those inside equally desperate to get out.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: What counts in making a happy marriage is not so much how compatible you are, but how you deal with incompatibility.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Marriage is the only adventure open to the cowardly.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The trouble is not that I am single and likely to stay single, but that I am lonely and likely to stay lonely.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: And she's got brains enough for two, which is the exact quantity the girl who marries you will need.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: To say that one waits a lifetime for his soulmate to come around is a paradox. People eventually get sick of waiting, take a chance on someone, and by the art of commitment become soulmates, which takes a lifetime to perfect.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Some people claim that marriage interferes with romance. There's no doubt about it. Anytime you have a romance, your wife is bound to interfere.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: A great marriage is not when the 'perfect couple' comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
quotes.author: Dave Meurer

quotes.quote: An object in possession seldom retains the same charm that it had in pursuit.
quotes.author: Pliny the Younger

quotes.quote: My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Matrimony is a process by which a grocer acquired an account the florist had.
quotes.author: Frances Rodman

quotes.quote: Never feel remorse for what you have thought about your wife; she has thought much worse things about you.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: Bigamy is having one husband or wife too many. Monogamy is the same.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Marriage means commitment. Of course, so does insanity.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: By all means marry; if you get a good wife you’ll become happy; if you get a bad one you’ll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: I never knew what real happiness was until I got married. And by then it was too late.
quotes.author: Max Kauffman

quotes.quote: Marriage is not a word — it is a sentence.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I still miss my ex-wife, but my aim is getting better.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Getting married is very much like going to a restaurant with friends. In both marriage and a restaurant you order what you want, then when you see what the other folks get, you wish you had ordered that.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A man likes his wife to be just clever enough to appreciate his cleverness, and just stupid enough to admire it.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: Marriage is nature's way of ensuring that a woman picks up some mothering experience before she has her first child.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: I have learned that only two things are necessary to keep one's wife happy. First, let her think she's having her own way. And second, let her have it.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Marriage is a lottery, but you can't tear up your ticket if you lose.
quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

quotes.quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To be happy with a man you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Marriage is like the army. Everybody complains, but you'd be surprised how many re-enlist.
quotes.author: James Garner

quotes.quote: There's only one way to have a happy marriage and as soon as I learn what it is I'll get married again.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Life has taught us that love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Somewhere there is someone that dreams of your smile, and finds in your presence that life is worthwhile, so when you are lonely remember its true, someone somewhere is thinking of you.
quotes.author: Atul Purohit

quotes.quote: What most people need to learn in life is how to love people and use things instead of using people and loving things.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Loving can cost a lot but not loving always costs more, and those who fear to love often find that want of love is an emptiness that robs the joy from life.
quotes.author: Merle Shain

quotes.quote: Love is the Fire of Life; it either consumes or purifies.
quotes.author: Swedish proverb

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A woman has got to love a bad man once or twice in her life, to be thankful for a good one.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: To fall in love is to create a religion that has a fallible god.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: Don't come crawlin' to a man for love--he likes to get a run for his money.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
quotes.author: André Gide

quotes.quote: The big difference between sex for money and sex for free is that sex for money usually costs a lot less.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: The opposite of love is not hate, its indifference.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Sex is like money; only too much is enough.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: For every beauty there is an eye somewhere to see it. For every truth there is an ear somewhere to hear it. For every love there is a heart somewhere to receive it.
quotes.author: Ivan Panin

quotes.quote: The law of love could be best understood and learned through little children.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Love is the flower of life, and blossoms unexpectedly and without law, and must be plucked where it is found, and enjoyed for the brief hour of its duration.
quotes.author: DH Lawrence

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: In love, women are professionals, men are amateurs.
quotes.author: Francois Truffaut

quotes.quote: I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is something far more than desire for sexual intercourse; it is the principal means of escape from the loneliness which afflicts most men and women throughout the greater part of their lives.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Many men kill themselves for love, but many more women die of it.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: When men and women are able to respect and accept their differences then love has a chance to blossom.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: A rose without thorns is like love without heartbreak; it doesn't make sense.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Franklin P Jones

quotes.quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: In the arithmetic of love, one plus one equals everything, and two minus one equals nothing.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is like pi - natural, irrational, and very important.
quotes.author: Lisa Hoffman

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Love is like a Rubik Cube, there are countless numbers of wrong twists and turns, but when you get it right, it looks
quotes.author: Brian Cramer

quotes.quote: In true love the smallest distance is too great, and the greatest distance can be bridged.
quotes.author: Hans Nouwens

quotes.quote: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Love comes unseen; we only see it go.
quotes.author: Austin Dobson

quotes.quote: Tis better to have loved and lost Than never to have loved at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Love is missing someone whenever you're apart, but somehow feeling warm inside because you're close in heart.
quotes.author: Kay Knudsen

quotes.quote: I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Love wasn't put in your heart to stay. Love isn't love until you give it away.
quotes.author: Michael W. Smith

quotes.quote: I no longer believed in the idea of soul mates, or love at first sight. But I was beginning to believe that a very few times in your life, if you were lucky, you might meet someone who was exactly right for you. Not because he was perfect, or because you were, but because your combined flaws were arranged in a way that allowed two separate beings to hinge together.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: Most people have a harder time letting themselves love than finding someone to love them.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: Real love is more than a physical feeling. If there's even the slightest doubt in your head about a guy, then forget about it. It's not real.
quotes.author: Ethan Embry

quotes.quote: Love me when I least deserve it, because that's when I really need it.
quotes.author: Swedish proverb

quotes.quote: Love is shown in your deeds, not in your words.
quotes.author: Fr. Jerome Cummings

quotes.quote: I would die for you. But I won't live for you.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: You know that when I hate you, it is because I love you to a point of passion that unhinges my soul.
quotes.author: Julie de Lespinasse

quotes.quote: People love others not for who they are but for how they make them feel.
quotes.author: Irwin Federman

quotes.quote: The greater your capacity to love, the greater your capacity to feel the pain.
quotes.author: Jennifer Anniston

quotes.quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: You have to walk carefully in the beginning of love; the running across fields into your lover's arms can only come later when you're sure they won't laugh if you trip.
quotes.author: Jonathan Carroll

quotes.quote: Love is much like a wild rose, beautiful and calm, but willing to draw blood in its defense.
quotes.author: Mark Overby

quotes.quote: Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss

quotes.quote: Some women choose to follow men, and some women choose to follow their dreams. If you're wondering which way to go, remember that your career will never wake up and tell you that it doesn't love you anymore.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Love is the condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: I heard what you said. I’m not the silly romantic you think. I don’t want the heavens or the shooting stars. I don’t want gemstones or gold. I have those things already. I want…a steady hand. A kind soul. I want to fall asleep, and wake, knowing my heart is safe. I want to love, and be loved.
quotes.author: Shana Abe

quotes.quote: You know its love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Eventually you will come to understand that love heals everything, and love is all there is.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Love is being stupid together.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: I don't want to live. I want to love first, and live incidentally.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Love is like seaweed; even if you have pushed it away, you will not prevent it from coming back.
quotes.author: Nigerian proverb

quotes.quote: What's meant to be will always find a way.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.quote: Love is the ultimate outlaw. It just won't adhere to any rules. The most any of us can do is sign on as its accomplice.
quotes.author: Tom Watson

quotes.quote: Love is the harmony of two souls singing together.
quotes.author: Gregory J. P. Godek

quotes.quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Pure love produces pure nonsense.
quotes.author: Jonathan Klinger

quotes.quote: Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: When a love comes to an end, weaklings cry, efficient ones instantly find another love, and the wise already have one in reserve.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Perhaps love is the process of my leading you gently back to yourself.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.quote: True Love burns the brightest, but the brightest flames leave the deepest scars.
quotes.author: Brandi Snyder

quotes.quote: Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If I never met you, I wouldn't like you. If I didn't like you, I wouldn't love you. If I didn't love you, I wouldn't miss you. But I did, I do, and I will.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no feeling more comforting and consoling than knowing you are right next to the one you love.
quotes.author: Kay Knudsen

quotes.quote: My daddy said, that the first time you fall in love, it changes you forever and no matter how hard you try, that feeling just never goes away.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is what makes two people sit in the middle of a bench when there is plenty of room at both ends.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: To love someone is nothing, to be loved by someone is something, but to be loved by the one you love is everything.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: I am not sure exactly what heaven will be like, but I know that when we die and it comes time for God to judge us, he will not ask, 'How many good things have you done in your life?' rather he will ask, 'How much love did you put into what you did?
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: He's more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Brontë

quotes.quote: Never frown, because you never know when someone is falling in love with your smile.
quotes.author: Christina Phan

quotes.quote: Love is saying 'I feel differently' instead of 'You're wrong’.
quotes.author: Brandi Synder

quotes.quote: The very essence of romance is uncertainty.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: If you love something let it go free. If it doesn't come back, you never had it. If it comes back, love it forever.
quotes.author: Doug Horton

quotes.quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: Man may have discovered fire, but women discovered how to play with it.
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.quote: A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Hatred is blind, as well as love.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world so wonderful as to love and be loved; there is nothing so devastating as love lost.
quotes.author: Larry Latta

quotes.quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr

quotes.quote: Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, but falling in love with you I had no control over.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When love is not madness it is not love.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderón de la Barca

quotes.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you’. Mature love says: 'I need you because I love you'.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Love means to commit oneself without guarantee, to give oneself completely in the hope that our love will produce love in the loved person. Love is an act of faith, and whoever is of little faith is also of little love.
quotes.author: Eric Fromm

quotes.quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Love is more afraid of change than destruction.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To keep your marriage brimming, with love in the loving cup, whenever you're wrong, admit it; Whenever you're right, shut up.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Love is one of the hardest words to say and one of the easiest to hear.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp
